title: Business site
summary: A fictional responsive website built with HTML, CSS & JavaScript. Includes hero video, card-based layout, signup form, and interactive hamburger menu. No backend connection — focus on responsive UI and clean code.

title: Recipe library
summary: An interactive recipe web app with possibility to search, filter and sort recipes by cuisine, diet, time and popularity using Spoonacular API. Data normalized and cached in localStorage for better performance and offline access

image.alt: pictures of food recipes and filtering options

title: Weather app – SMHI API
summary: A responsive weather app displaying current weather conditions and 5-day forecasts for multiple Swedish cities using the SMHI API. Built collaboratively using Git and TypeScript for safer data handling and cleaner code.

title: Build a Quiz with Web Accessibility in mind
summary: A responsive Quiz build with web accessibility in mind. The quiz tests users' knowledge of the team that built the website through multiple-choice questions. It provides instant feedback on answers and a final score at the end. As a second page reveals information about the team and answers to the quiz questions.

image.alt: Picture of web accessibility quiz results

title: Happy Thoughts - Fullstack Twitter-inspired App
summary: is a Twitter-inspired fullstack application where users can share positive messages, like others’ thoughts, and manage their own posts. The project features a custom Express/MongoDB backend with schema validation, authentication, and a RESTful API, fully integrated with a modern React frontend. Users can sign up or log in to access protected features such as posting, editing, and deleting their own thoughts, with all communication secured by token-based authorization. Both frontend and backend provide real-time validation and error handling, ensuring a seamless and secure user experience. The app is fully responsive, accessible, and demonstrates clean code architecture with separation of concerns, DRY principles, and well-documented, maintainable code.

title: Movie App - React & TMDB API
summary: A React-based movie discovery application that fetches and displays popular movies using The Movie Database (TMDB) API. Users can browse a responsive grid of movie posters and click to view detailed information about each film.

title: Todo App - Zustand State Management
summary: A clean and responsive todo application built with React and Zustand for global state management. Users can add, remove, and toggle tasks between completed and uncompleted states. Features task counts, friendly empty states and full accessibility

image.alt: Picture of todo app with task list and completion tracking
